Author: CMaurice#1685
Content: OK, great. Now, I don't like to do this not just because  suggesting how people should do things is problematic, but... I think I've found a tool that could be useful for the project and  perhaps the wider komodoverse. Basically it enables a reductionist command line language, simplifying complex commands: https://github.com/casey/just/blob/master/justfile

Author: CMaurice#1685
Content: I trust this tool because it is used in the clip-os project, and they've presumably done some security work on it.

Author: CMaurice#1685
Content: I found it though their docs.

Author: CMaurice#1685
Content: To skim that rather large page, read the first bit at the top and # further-ramblings at the bottom

Author: CMaurice#1685
Content: it would've been nice that time if @jl777c  could've said `just build jl777 FSM` ffs

Author: CMaurice#1685
Content: let me know what you think

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: FSM currently is broken, use jl777 branch

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: we expect a fix to the addressindex rpc tomorrow, after that the CC will work again

Author: CMaurice#1685
Content: So, in that event a `git pull` of the repo would've updated the justfile, which the dev would have changed to make any `just build` commands to build the jl777 branch. Hopefully I got that right.
